englishTranslationText:
And	by	oath	of	the	day	that	is	a	witness	and	
by	oath	of	a	day	in	which	the	people	
present	themselves.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	us	din	ki	jis	meiñ	ḥāzir	hote	haiñ

englishTranslationText: Accursed	be	the	People	of	the	Ditch!
romanUrduTranslationText: Khāyi	wāloñ	par	l’anat	ho

englishTranslationText: The	people	of	the	fuelled	blazing	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh	us	bhadakti	āag	wāle

englishTranslationText: When	they	were	sitting	at	its	edge.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jab	woh	us	ke	kināroñ	par	baithe	the

arabicText: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	themselves	are	witnesses	to	
what	they	were	doing	to	the	Muslims!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	khud	gawāh	haiñ	jo	kuch	
Musalmānoñ	ke	sāth	kar	rahe	the

arabicText: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
englishTranslationText:
And	what	did	they	dislike	from	the	
Muslims,	except	that	the	Muslims	accepted	
faith	in	Allah	the	Most	Honourable,	the	
Most	Praiseworthy?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unheñ	Musalmānoñ	kā	kiyā	burā	lagā	
yahi	na	ke	woh	Imān	lāye	Allāh	‘izzat	wāle	
sab	khoobiyoñ	sarāhe	par.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
englishTranslationText:
To	Him	only	belongs	the	kingship	of	the	
heavens	and	the	earth;	and	Allah	is	a	
Witness	over	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ke	usi	ke	liye	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ki	
salṭanat	hai	aur	Allāh	har	cheez	par	gawāh	
hai.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	troubled	the	Muslim	
men	and	Muslim	women,	and	then	did	not	
repent	–	for	them	is	the	punishment	of	hell,	
and	for	them	is	the	punishment	of	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	jinhoñ	ne	ižā	di	Musalmān	
mardoñ	aur	Musalmān	‘auratoñ	ko	phir	
tauba	na	ki	un	ke	liye	Jahannam	kā	‘ažāb	
hai	aur	un	ke	liye	āag	kā	‘ažāb

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	believed	and	did	good	deeds	–	for	them	are	Gardens	beneath	which	rivers	flow;	
this	is	the	great	success.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	jo	Imān	lāye	aur	achche	kām	kiye	
un	ke	liye	bāgh	haiñ	jin	ke	neeche	nehreiñ	rawāñ	yahi	badi	kāmyābi	hai.

englishTranslationText: Indeed	the	seizure	of	your	Lord	is	very	severe.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	tere	Rab	ki	girift	bahut	sakht	hai

englishTranslationText: Indeed	it	is	He	Who	initiates	and	redoes.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	woh	pahle	kare	aur	phir	kare

englishTranslationText: And	He	only	is	the	Oft	Forgiving,	the	Beloved	of	His	bondmen.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	wohi	hai	bakhshne	wālā	apne	nek	bandoñ	par	piyārā

englishTranslationText: Master	of	the	Honourable	Throne.
romanUrduTranslationText: ‘Arsh	kā	mālik	‘izzat	wālā.

englishTranslationText: Always	doing	whatever	He	wills.
romanUrduTranslationText: Hamesha	jo	chāhe	kar	lene	wālā

englishTranslationText: Did	the	story	of	the	armies	reach	you?
romanUrduTranslationText: Kyā	tumhāre	pās	lashkaroñ	ki	bāt	āayi?

englishTranslationText: (The	armies	of)	Firaun	and	the	tribe	of	Thamud.
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh	lashkar	kaun	Fir’aun	aur	Samod

englishTranslationText: In	fact	the	disbelievers	are	in	denial.
romanUrduTranslationText: Balke	kāfir	jhutlāne	meiñ	haiñ

englishTranslationText: And	Allah	is	after	them,	has	them	surrounded.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Allāh	un	ke	peeche	se	unheñ	ghere	huye	hai

englishTranslationText: In	fact	it	(what	they	deny)	is	the	Noble	Qur’an.
romanUrduTranslationText: Balke	woh	kamāl-e-sharaf	wālā	Qur’ān	hai.

englishTranslationText: In	the	Preserved	Tablet.
romanUrduTranslationText: Loḥ-e-Maḥfooz	meiñ.

englishTranslationText:
By	oath	of	the	heaven,	and	by	oath	of	the	
nightly	arriver.
romanUrduTranslationText: Āsmān	ki	qasam	aur	rāt	ko	āane	wāle	ki

englishTranslationText:
And	have	you	understood	what	the	nightly	
arriver	is?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kuch	tum	ne	jānā	woh	rāt	ko	āane	wālā	
kyā	hai?

englishTranslationText: The	very	brightly	shining	star!
romanUrduTranslationText: Khob	chamaktā	tārā

arabicText: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
There	is	not	a	soul	that	does	not	have	a	
guardian	over	it.
romanUrduTranslationText: Koyi	jān	nahiñ	jis	par	nigehbān	na	ho

englishTranslationText:
So	man	must	consider	from	what	he	has	
been	created.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	chāhiye	ke	āadmi	gaur	kare	ke	kis	cheez	
se	banāyā	gayā

englishTranslationText: Created	from	a	gushing	fluid.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jast	karte	(uchhalte	huye)	pāni	se

englishTranslationText:
That	is	issued	from	between	the	backs	and	
the	ribs.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jo	nikaltā	hai	peeth	aur	sinoñ	ke	beech	se

englishTranslationText: Indeed	Allah	is	Able	to	return	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	Allāh	us	ke	wāpas	kar	dene	par	
qādir	hai.

englishTranslationText: A	day	when	the	secrets	will	be	examined.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jis	din	chupi	batoñ	ki	jāñch	hogi

arabicText: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍۢ وَلَا نَاصِرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
So	man	will	neither	have	any	strength	nor	
any	aide.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	ādmi	ke	pās	na	kuch	zor	hogā	na	koyi	
madadgār

englishTranslationText:
By	oath	of	the	sky	from	which	comes	down	
the	rain.
romanUrduTranslationText: Āsmān	ki	qasam	jis	se	miñh	utartā	hai

englishTranslationText:
And	by	oath	of	the	earth	which	flourishes	
with	it.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	zameen	ki	jo	us	se	khulti	hai

englishTranslationText: Indeed	the	Qur’an	is	a	decisive	Word.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	Qur’ān	zaroor	faisla	ki	bāt	hai

englishTranslationText: And	is	not	a	matter	of	amusement.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	koyi	hañsi	ki	bāt	nahiñ

englishTranslationText:
Indeed	the	disbelievers	carry	out	their	evil	
schemes.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	kāfir	apnā	sā	dāoñ	chalte	haiñ

englishTranslationText: And	I	secretly	plan.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	maiñ	apni	khufiya	tadbeer	farmātā	
hooñ

englishTranslationText: Therefore	give	them	some	respite	-	give	them	some	time.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	tum	kāfiroñ	ko	dheel	do	unheñ	kuchh	
thodi	muhlat	do.

englishTranslationText: Proclaim	the	Purity	of	your	Lord,	the	Supreme.
romanUrduTranslationText: Apne	Rab	ke	nām	ki	pāki	bolo	jo	sab	se	buland	hai
